c74object.name: fl.fft~
c74object.digest: Calculate the real Fast Fourier Transform of an input frame.
c74object.description: All FFTs performed will use a power of two size. Output frames will be (N / 2) + 1 in length where N is the FFT size. Inputs which are not a power of two are zero-padded to the next power of two. Real and imaginary values are output as separate frames.

entry.name: 0. /maxlength [instantiation int]
entry.description: Sets the maximum input length / FFT size.

entry.name: 1. /normalise [instantiation bool]
entry.description: When on the output is normalised so that sine waves produce the same level output regardless of the FFT size.

entry.name: 2. /mode [instantiation enum]
entry.description:
Sets the type of input expected / output produced.
[0] - real [1] - complex [2] - fullspectrum
